reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Evaluation of budget process transparency and use of public means intended for road infrastructure via journalistic monitoring

description.narrative: The Project aims at contributing to the enhancement of transparency in the process of public money use for maintenance of local roads via monitoring the activity of planning and managing financial means.Objectives of the project are:1. To monitor the plann ing and use of financial means for road infrastructure maintenance by mass-media and inform the communities about that.2. To facilitate the process of consulting priority costs inside the communities.3. To enhance the journalists? capacities to assess the transparency of planning and managing public money and multiply good practices in the field.
